scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Manuscripts and other works (1958-2011, undated) comprises books and poems by Jane Gentry Vance's contemporaries, as well as the drafts, revisions, printings of books, reviews, papers, and many poems by Vance. The series contains the drafts for Vance's two books, a collection of poems, A Garden in Kentucky (1995) and Portrait of the Artist as a White Pig (2006). Also included is correspondence with editing boards and publishers.
